DOC.brief_summary: Three-arm open, randomized comparative study of acetazolamide, dexamethasone, or no additional treatment to evaluate decrease in peri-calcification edema in neurocysticercosis
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Peri-calcification Edema in Neurocysticercosis (NCC)
DOC.detailed_description: This study will evaluate 24 patients with calcified NCC and edema in three treatment arms to compare the reduction in edema volume
DOC.criteria: Calcified NCC Perilesional edema on CT or MRI Normal lab values Viable neurocysticercosis Status epilepticus Symptomatic intracranial hypertension Tuberculosis More than 7 days after seizure Pregnancy
